metadata.title: Remnant of the Divinity: The Aberrant Loser

tracks.text: Muscular legs walk foward. Twin green blades dangle to side. The thighs bear large, dark scars.
Muscular arms and abs also bear scars.
Sunraku wears only blue shorts and a blue bird mask.
Red text appears, Shangri-La Frontier. Beyond the text is an expanse of mountains, forests, plains, and cities. We zoom out and the expanse is reflected in VR goggles worn by Rakuro
At night, Sunraku stands in a misty field
Moon light shines over Sunraku as he stands near large rocks.
Rakuro smiles. His image glitches into Sunraku, whose brow furrows
Pencilgon, a woman with long purple hair, twirls a spear in a forest.
A girl with blond pig tails walks forward. Looking away from us, she puts her hands on her hips.
Psyger-0, a knight, wears a helmet. Emul wears a suit and top hat. She leaps and is replaced by her human form.
Vysache wears an eye patch. He holds a carrot shaped smoking pipe and sits cross legged in a low lit, traditional Japanese room
A man wearing armor and a purple cape sits on a box in a storage room.
Lycagon bears fangs over a forest, backdropped by a red moon. Yellow lines shine around her red, glowing eyes.
Sunraku runs through the woods. He leaps, and crosses in front of a full moon.
Flying through the air, he kicks and punches goblins. Holding red twin knives, he cuts at more goblins.
With red glowing fists, the blond girl fires energy blasts at goblins. Pencilgon strikes human sized wasps. They fight back to back.
Vysache, with a scar over his right eye, slowly opens his eyes.
Pencilgon strikes with a sword. The blond girl punches with a fire ball.
Psyger-0 strikes the ground, and the ground explodes with brilliant light that fades to lightning.
A town of small red houses and rabbit shaped motifs. A large temple rests at the top of a giant tree.
The town fades into Sunraku's red bird eye
Emul leaps up, smiling.
In a forest glowing with a red mist, the blond girl, Sunraku, and Pencilgon walk side by side.
Text, 7, Remnant of the Divinity: The Aberrant Loser
Girls in sailor style school uniforms walk through suburbs.
Rei walks alone, hanging her head.
She looks up
She walks into a pole
Rain drizzles over the school
Rei walks alone down the hallway.
She watches through the window of Rakuro's classroom.
In a judo dojo, Rei flips a large boy over her shoulder.
She straightens her gi, a white robe.
Birds flock
At the game store, Rakuro digs through a bin.
Rei watches from behind a shelf. Rakuro looks at 2 VR disc cases.
Rei smiles, her cheeks red, her eyes glistening.
Mana taps Rei's shoulder. Rei turns so red, steam rises from her head.
4 PKers attack Sunraku
Sunraku dodges an axe from Branch.
Ketchum swings a long sword. Sunraku leaps.
Psyger-0 leaps
The strike kicks dirt hundreds of feet in the air.
Sunraku looks at the knight's label, which doesn't have a skull icon.
Animalia clutches her bone hand staff.
Pencilgon dissolves into blue from the fiery purple explosion.
Sunraku and Emul look at the explosion, eyes wide. The PKers gape.
Sunraku runs up Psyger-0's sword.
She looks up as he launches off of her helmet.
She falls back, he flies into the air.
Psyger-0 braces herself. The PKers watch Sunraku land on the ground in front of them.
Psyger-0 strikes.
He runs up the stairs and enters Thirdrema.
Psyger-0 puts her hand to her chest.
She cuts Branch in half.
She takes a dramatic stance, holding her giant purple sword.
Lass and Remy scream. Dirt explosion.
A door forms in a wall. Label, Rabituza Inn.
Emul drinks a potion.
Message dialog.
Rabituza Palace
Label, Vorpal Colosseum
A large dirt circle with 3 tiers of stands. There are 12 entrances to the stands and 4 red huts serve as entrances to the arena grounds.
He stretches
He equips a pair of vorpal choppers
She pulls on a chain, opening the door of the north hut.
A mist of red then blue
Emul slumps
In Rei's bedroom, the Yojijukugo wall scroll reads "Constant Progress"
In an aura of bubbles and sparkles, pink pedal fly past Sunraku. He turns to look at her, sparkles in his eyes. Emul sits on his shoulder, her eyes censored.
Rakuro
Rei squirms in bed
Hounds enter the colisseum.
The pack leader's eyes grow wide
He strikes the leader's stomach.
It falls back, rolls, then runs off. 3 more hounds approach
He throws a chopper, landing in the leader's haunches. He strikes. Critical.
The leader dissolves into blue pixels.
He strikes as the attack one by one. They fall to the side and dissolve.
9 snakes slither, emerging from the back of a bear with scars and a glowing red eye.
Stamp reads, Defeated on 4th try
Goblin berserker, 2nd try
Dinoboar, 1st try
Toxic eagle, try 112
Armored Larva, first try
Execu-panther, 1st try
Twinhead Tiger, 2nd try
Beta Unit Golem S2, 7th try
Level up, 30 arrow 31
He makes a fist around the collar.
He stands on a hut, holding a twig-like bundle. His attendants gather.
The twigs wear a witch hat. They're wrapped in chains and talismans.
Vash snaps. The talismans and chains fall.
The 5 legged tree man rises slowly.
A tree limb strikes. He narrowly sidesteps.
The Woodsman waves a staff. Purple holes appear in the arena, and limbs grow out of them.
Sunraku dodges wildly
Vash takes a drag off his pipe.
Vash smiles
Aberrant Woodsman, Level 120
Rakuro floats, as if in water. Debris floats around him.
He reaches out a hand. The debris glitters.
He opens his blue eyes. He has short, spiky blue hair.
Pixels float in cyberspace. We follow a tunnel of light
Grass blows before an orange sunset.
Sunraku, bearing Lycagon's Mark, stands.
Rei opens her brown eyes. She has short brown hair that wraps around her face.
Sunraku walks on a path with Emul, a white bunny wearing a blue coat, red vest, and top hat. Emul twirls and back flips.
Surrounded by stone columns, Psyger-0, a knight appears. Her armor is white and lined in gold. Her helmet bears a long, red plume.
Arthur Pencilgon, a woman with long purple hair, looks determined. Her hair moves gently in the wind.
A blond woman looks up. She has shoulder length hair tied up in pig tails.
Sunraku stares up as clouds roll over a blue sky. It glows yellow with a sunset, then darkens to a dark purple moon.
His bird mask feathers blows in the wind.
Pencilgon stands on a cliff in front of the moon, her hands on her hips.
The blond woman crouches on a outcropping, in front of the moon
Sunraku and Psyger-0 stand, facing opposite directions, surrounded by floating debris, backdropped by a nebula that glows prismatically from red to green to blue.
Blue pixels float in cyberspace as we fly through a tunnel of light
Elementary students sit in front of a stage. Sunraku pushes the word SLF Mini
Text, 10, You'll Pay. Oh, You Will Pay...
A bird flies in the sky.
Toxic Eagle, Try 45
The eagle rises, then poops on his face. He dissolves.
Text, 11, What kind of man is Rakuro Hizutome?
In a sparkly bubbly aura, Rakuro smiles and gives a thumbs up.
In a classroom, Rei doodles Rakuro smiling and giving a thumbs up.
Text, This daydream is fiction. It has no relation to actual people or trash game hunters.
Quote from Kojien, 7th Edition. "If you struggle while you're young, the experience will be useful later, so you should aggressively pursue trials."
